lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role where a bunch of us nerdy ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We play Dungeons & Dragons!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hi guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hi. (clears throat) Oh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Link is dndbeyond.com/marketplace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's roll--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You really did that, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will definitely deduct the entire cost of my vacation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you about to use your kids to shill D&D Beyond?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a great thing to do on video.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The IRS isn't watching, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is something that'll show up everywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They were like what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And rightfully so, to be fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So thank you, D&D Beyond, and we will check in with you next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've never been and I don't ever intend to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we got to remedy that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I have no interest! No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be on the kiddy slopes together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (emphatic) No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No! I stay indoors, I build snowmen out of snow, I throw snowballs, and that's the extent of my relationship with it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You will do Hot Pepper Gaming 17 times, but you won't go skiing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: People die when they ski.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They die when they eat ghost peppers and you've done it twice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody's got a thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I got too much--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis has The Ring girl. You have skiing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why, why? Leave it on him. all right? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Travis, do you want to talk about the other craziness this week?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's hard to breathe sometimes. We find ourselves staring quite a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this real life?

lines.name: MARISHA, TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you haven't, until April 18th at 11:59PM Pacific at critrole.com/animated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Crit Role!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said that so calm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Critters are amazing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm try to keep it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As much as you can, don't get too rough on this, but thank you for everything, and I'm proud of all the stuff that we can do for each other going forward, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Hear hear! Hear hear!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's possibly never been a better time to be a self-starter than right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's possibly never been a better time to be a nerd.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Truth. Truth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We did inherit the Earth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: People that have never heard about D&D before, RPG gaming, all this stuff, man, they are paying attention now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got to keep us all humble, Matt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all a celebration, right? So he can't do anything to me. I'm untouchable! Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nott's going down tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I, for one, am excited for your new character.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we got this flask, normal, normal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter) And if we get to 8.8.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What the fuck? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are the stretch goals.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (high-pitched) Where were you hiding that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a four gallon flask.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You won't even be able to see my face!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, in that case, let's definitely try and do it for that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If someone can find a bigger one, I'll put it on the show.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last we left off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And are still--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And are still lost, wandering a space they are unfamiliar with amongst creatures that may or may not be amiable to your presence.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The beautiful, dark-skinned, shaved head, long-eared elf monk of the Cobalt Soul, and for lack of a better term, the Expositor caseworker of Beauregard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Social worker?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I recall, the ones that made it to this were Beau, Jester, and Caleb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cacaw!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So what the hell are you doing here?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can trust her, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who is "her"? Who is this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is my mentor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who are these people? "Who are these individuals?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hiiiiiiii.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm Jester.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Widogast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've been doing good things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good things like traveling into enemy territory?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Nott? Where is everybody else? I thought they were right behind us.

lines.name: LARUA
lines.text: I don't know. They disappeared after we left the bar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There was a bit of a fray at the end there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The other ones that are coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you have the rest of your friends with you, "I'm very hopeful they have not disappeared."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you doing here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, send a message.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Reply to this message, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I hear it? He has to point it in my direction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You gather the base direction of where the bar was and in the second attempt, you do manage to get through.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I repeat something like that the second time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, where are you again? Sorry, we're behind the bar, what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're at the bar now? Reply to this message,

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can reply to this message.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that Caleb?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, of course, who else would it be?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know who you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we reply to that message, or was that just the reply to another replied message?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are not too far from the bar, in fact we are only a few blocks away but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tell him you take a left and then you take a right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was the second alley after--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think there was a store that had--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shh, keep it down."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't see the sun, so I don't know which way's north, but can you clap? Clap really loud or something so we know where you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not going to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb, talk quieter. We have to be quiet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go to the bar and wait--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go in the bar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go to the front of the bar and I am going to meet you there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to meet them at the front of the bar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At the front door?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you leaving right now, Caleb?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got to go through the bar?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why don't we just walk around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can do that. Let's go around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'll walk around the bar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And meet you at the front door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ask him, is it just him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just you? You can reply to this message.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am with a group of people, including people you know, but I am coming by myself, stay there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, this is such-- everybody's had this text conversation in the past.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You stay there, we're going to move, all right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going somewhere else?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to go around the bar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, to the front.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. They're saving us seats for the movie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll hold off on the important bits. Go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll be right back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dairon is staring right through you, Beauregard, and going--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? Why are you looking at me like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "These are your companions for a "mission to infiltrate?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were pirates for like three months.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we were really good pirates. Super duper good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should've seen what we did.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Fucking great."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anyway, I am going to go outside now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do notice also the shed can maybe contain the four of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have somewhere bigger we can meet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this where you've been staying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, but it was the closest place I can "think of which it would be most private."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you're searching for someone, "this person who was taken, you say?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were taken by a few wizardly-looking type of people. Mages.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Were they taken by the mages, or were they taken by the Kryn because the mages were interested in them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Feels like they could be potentially one and the same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which mages took them?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wrote notes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There was an old guy, and there was also this lady who looked a little intimidating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is this on the Dynasty side, "or is this in the Empire?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not actually from either place, so it's hard for me to know exactly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very interesting."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think the Kryn took him away from them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But the Empire people seemed to have interest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah. He was studying-- what's that word? About the time stuff, dunim...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you know which individuals this was? Do you have names?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Lady Vess DeRogna and Archmage Ludinus Da'leth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(chuckles) Of course it would be. All right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have my own business here, and it seems maybe "parts of our paths are not entirely disparate."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you work for them? Tell me you don't work for them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I do not work for them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Cobalt Reserve and the Cerberus Assembly disagree on many things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I believe I spoke with you last, correct?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "From the spell? Sent words to me?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, yes, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I apologize for the ruse."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what the hell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not supposed to be."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lady Olios is looking for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless there's another spy from the Empire around, but I don't think so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As soon as I saw you looking through me, it felt really familiar, as you're doing right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Especially with this little bit of a disguise," and she rubs some of the mud off your cheek.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, well, you know, can't fucking help that I'm the only simple fucking human who can't change into shit here. Can you help with that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have my own preparations." She touches a ring on her middle finger and goes, "I need this, "but get more prepared next time." At this point, Caleb, have you retrieved the rest of the party?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I go to the bar and I wait in front of the building.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys arrive at the same time and they're like--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like no one would know anything was wrong.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Speaking of bar: Thanks Alex and Tyler and Henry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, you guys are gathered by Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where did you go? Where did you go? Where were you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Literally nowhere. We were in the back looking for you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, save it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was waving everywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Save it. We're going a couple blocks away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you guys safe? Are we going into a fight?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a broom closet, though, I don't know if we're going to fit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does this count as a rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh yeah, we're super fucked up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we keep an eye to see if anyone's watching us go towards this broom closet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you may. Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a "fid-ine."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15! That is a word, actually, thank you very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? Okay. You-- Caduceus' color scheme draws a little bit of attention.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those pastels, goddamn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: LAUR:A I just cast Cure Wounds on you at 1st-level, so you got ten healing points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Jester.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast it on myself, too, for 13 healing points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now keep that face while we're walking, all right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull a little bit of mud out of my pocket and I slap it down on top of his pink hair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's cold. That's really cold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a mess. That's good, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She has a scowling expression mid-conversation with your other compatriots before she looks around at the rest of you and goes, "I'm going to be honest, I'm very impressed you have "come this far without being noticed "with such a... cluster."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did they tell you to make that face, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't like most of them."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet you like me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have a hunch that the Assembly may be aiding the Kryn "in some way."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This dunamancy you speak of--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's super powerful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know how long you intend to stay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Neither do we.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have the weird portal deal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What is your name?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (grumpier) It's a pleasure to meet you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Deucey, you can-- not in here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh thank god, that was really hard, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, the goblin one."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nott. And you?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm Fjord. Pleasure to make your acquaintance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. Well."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I figured out one of the things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bird?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What birds?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The rest of my mission is directly "gathering of information and returning myself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we need to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I'm not traveling with you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe we could reconvene, if you are "indeed heading that far into the east, "but it is folly to combine efforts in travel."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Might be worth a little extra effort in the day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you were able to pull off such a deceit, then that would be a great boon to me and my movements, but...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I defer to you, I don't know this person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What you've told me is very grave for my interests here, "but nevertheless I was moving further east."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why don't we just say we didn't find the spy, you know, and we just looked for those portals and stuff?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seems safer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Prove that the operation's over and that we've found the mechanisms by which it was operating.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, orchestrated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Orchestrated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have some sort of headquarters with a pile of birds somewhere?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A bunch of notes scribbled and stuff that don't mean anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's an Expositor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Yeah, I think you mentioned her before.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is information I would prefer to not be "spreading around in the future, if you don't mind."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which we did not hear. Not a problem.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I apologize, you say in the midst of this war between the Empire and the Kryn Dynasty, you feel that there are people from the Cerberus Assembly who are in league with someone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Something about this dunamantic magics, "as you mentioned, seems to be intrinsically "tied to their movements as well."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So suspicions, but no inkling as to motivation from the Empire side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And that is extremely scary to me."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have intentions of pulling them down, you say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "With ever fiber of my being."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That seems like a very tall order to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let me see if I can give you some guidance before I exit."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fight, fight, fight, fight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leans out into the alleyway. "No!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do actually have our own issues to deal with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Everyone now seems to be focused on the "conflict and worried about losing their foothold "over in the various encampments they've taken."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Were these murders localized on any one area of town or just all over?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On one family.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Old Potis' family.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be the one."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh just that one that you've heard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All that I've heard recently, but I "haven't seen any strange creatures, "something of the Infernal," and looks to Caleb and goes, "other than you and your background."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, because you're a demon person.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aren't you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're referring to this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, it's a sore spot for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be an immediate giveaway."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not my real accent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your real accent? One more question on a more personal level, you said you're headed towards Ghor Dranas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have any intelligence about where you're headed? Like, for instance, if there was a political prisoner being held, maybe where they would be, what--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have no idea, I have not been there before."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have a contact you are meeting there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am my own agent in this, but I'm sent "on this because I am very good at working alone."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the other hand, you now have friends, so when you get to this town, if you could actually maybe do a little digging and we could message you at some point maybe, I mean we know what direction you're going to be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just tell us what it looks like and where to enter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or if you've heard anything about the person that we're looking for.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like where soldiers are less concentrated and stuff so we could get in and stuff, that'd be great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Obviously you'd still be alone, a lone wolf.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're constantly talking to you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone shut up for a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dairon turns to you and goes, "Do you trust these people? "Do your instincts tell you that they can be trusted?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, close talk, let's everybody step out and give them a minute, just a second.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, Fjord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, everyone leave okay? It's just us girls and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, would you mind?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a lot of good information, a lot of things that I can inform you of, but you keep writing me off pretty fucking easily right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have to be careful what information is disseminated."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was I supposed to do? Just go out alone and just piss into the wind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean..."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How was I supposed to get better? You fucking left! You told me you were going to Bladegarden for a month.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But that happened anyway."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And not because of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, regardless, I'm just concerned for your well-being."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm concerned for yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can do great if maybe we team up a little bit, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But you have to find your own way and I will find mine."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Inform your friends."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Cerberus Assembly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This does not surprise me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beings, I don't know, whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where do you stand with the Kryn on this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Stand with the Kryn?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have any idea of their motivation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you had been paying attention "in your historical studies, you know "the drow cannot be trusted."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That seems like a generalization considering--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've lost people important to me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would think you-- you taught me that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm very impressed by what you "displayed there in the gravel pit."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've had good conversations too, just fucking no one's been there to fucking see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can you serve that purpose?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just know that you've done good, "and hope you live long enough to see the impact it has."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could be dead tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You could, but you're not yet."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Protect these friends you've made, "but don't get too close."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I haven't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good. Now I need to go and "collect my things, "my birds, my materials for travel."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you name your birds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. Do not get too close." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should have Jester name your birds--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I named a bird once and it never came back, "so I do not name my birds."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can mix it up or something, maybe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I knock on the door and say: It's a weasel!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Weasel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate your concern, I will say "that weasels are not known for their ability "to travel long distances with messages safely."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, but they can hold their breath for a real long fucking time, apparently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Noted."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just throwing it out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, that will be important to add "to the archives of the Cobalt Soul."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Monk talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "After the sun is down, look for me "on the outskirts behind the Four Corners."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think I have a place where we can safely train."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll find you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you are capable of doing the things "you wish to do, you should be able to find me."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She grabs the ring and twists it a bit and her form turns back into that of a dark elf.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dope!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you for your patience, and good luck."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You too.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Imagine my face, but animated.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Animation.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Animation!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasps) [High-Pitched Tone]

lines.text: What's wrong, honey?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had a dream that Critical Role is making an animated special.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll talk about it in the morning.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Now! Rise and shine everyone! (groaning)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why would you do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A bunch of nerdy ass voice actors.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And today we are thrilled to announce our 45 day campaign for a Critical Role (gasps) animated special!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now with your support, we're going to make that dream a reality and fund a fully animated half hour special starring the original characters from our first campaign.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we are calling it The Legend of Vox Machina.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa, no no no, uh-uh! Hold your horses okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why? What's wrong?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I mean, some folks might not know, ow, who the hell we are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good point. For those who are not familiar, Critical Role is a live roleplaying show that streams on Thursday nights featuring us, a group of best friends who happen to be professional voice actors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know who you are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So needless to say, we're pretty stoked to finally take the next big step and make an animated special.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So without further ado, let's roll that--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not yet!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grr!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They still don't know about our creative partners.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not animators, but we happen to know some folks who are pretty good at it.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Are we drawing this (censor beep) cartoon or what? It's got action, it's got comedy, it's got drunkenness, it's got everything!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are also bringing in one of the busiest animation writers in the biz to help craft a brand new adventure for Vax Machina.

lines.name: JENNIFER
lines.text: Also, the bad guy is going to be revealed to be none other than--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whew. That was close.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, too!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the ones I can do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we'll even be joined by some special celebrity cameos.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll the freakin' clip!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We still need to explain why we need the campaign in the first place.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But I am 100% sure we can get there because after all, I do play a forensic scientist on TV, so I know what I'm talking about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Laura, why don't you do the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Role that (censor beep) clip! ♪ Role, Critical ♪ ♪ The adventure begins ♪ ♪ They were always besides you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends ♪ ♪ And the DM to guide you ♪ ♪ And they rise from the flames for the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains beware because you're about to be dead ♪ (epic rock music) ♪ They got magic and flair, they got daggers and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there, there's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting, rise up, don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands, ♪ ♪ take a chance, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Role, Critical ♪ ♪ Role, Critical ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call, diggin' deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn ♪ ♪ To roll! ♪ (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We probably should've led with that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be rolling out all kinds of campaign specific rewards, and the higher up you go, the more we can unlock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like me. (glass clink)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can expect the final delivery of The Legend of Vox Machina in the fall of 2020.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for sharing our excitement and your support of this project.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Bidet, friends!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Bidet! (tribal drumming)

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: This week Between the Sheets is back with the man, the myth, the legend, Mr. Chris Perkins.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: One of the first emails I got in the job as the new editor of Dungeon Magazine was from some guy, but I kept it because it grounded me.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What do you mean? What was it?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: "Bring back Dragonlance, you fuck." Was the sum total--

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.text: [classical music] [epic orchestral ballad music]

lines.text: Congratulations.

lines.text: Like wick resolution.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.text: Could have a candle company.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Phantom tea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's fucking cold out and it's the worst way to hurt your joints without warming up first.

lines.text: I learn something new every day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.text: Let's assemble the troops and head to the haunted well.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It'll be great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to hurry because the sun is going to come up soon, I think.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got a couple hours.

lines.text: Was there a haunted well where you grew up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You live in a place like that, you're bound to hear a few.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you for the armor back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks for letting me borrow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, nope. Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No chance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ready to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you learn a lot?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we really need to figure out some better disguises if we're going to stick around for a little bit. I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We should go,

lines.text: How's your health?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm all right. I rested up a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Need anything? You all right?

lines.text: That's not bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine, let's do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's more than I can ever dream of.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stealthily.

lines.text: Yasha included.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: SAM

lines.text: What'd you do?

lines.text: (singing) Pass Without a Trace!

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fragment of possibility upon yourself, that is taken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 and 26, Beauregard?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, do we have a plus something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah. 24.

lines.text: Come on.

lines.text: What would you wish to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Want to follow me? Anyone out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're making your way through the city you do notice that it doesn't seem to have really diminished the presence of various civilians in the region.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a gathering of carts or boxes or some sort of cargo anywhere near us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't tell.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hobo barrel?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hobo barrel will work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a great juggalo song.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was the entry to the cavern or the pathway or whatever below the waterline or above it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seemed like it was above.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Above.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm casting Minor Illusion. Create that little fire.

lines.text: Caduceus, actually, because-- I need to look at that more-- because of your perception, you do notice as you guys are walking by, the structure to your right, you glance through one of the small oval-like portholes and you see some sort of strange, drifting bit of faint blue energy.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I say we go in and take--

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Yeah, we're going to the front.

lines.text: That is a 23.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whump)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.text: You didn't hear any conversation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh shite.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can either use ISUPPORTSAM, I think that was what it was.

lines.text: I think it's cooler.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, no, no, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.name: LIAM

lines.text: Caduceus, where are you?

lines.text: Can I see them, where are they? Okay.

lines.text: No, you don't see anything, the door is closed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll be behind Josh then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're behind Yasha.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I guess I'll just be peeking in the door from outside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's go ahead and get initiative put on you guys here.

lines.text: That was a lot of dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a single die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Turn off the reverb on the [inaudible].

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At that point, I would say initiative wise, 25 to 20, anybody?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 for Jester.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 17 for Cad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau-- Sorry, 16 for--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 16, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Caduceus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You were so stoked that. Did you roll well?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This was a really good roll for me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was so cute.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got plans, man. Plans.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yasha rolled a 14.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's just, like, your opinion, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got some good spells that are really--

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: So they're hiding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What will you do with your turn, buddy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. I could just attack, or I could...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mrs. Nott.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Miss Nott.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to attack them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will just send a message to Caleb and say: Two in the room hiding in the ceiling upper corners when you come through the door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is to see if you can quietly convey that without their noticing.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any movement?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With bonus action, can I activate Mage Hand, just to have it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can cast it as a bonus action?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I can, I will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run forward and open the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Solo hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As much as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.text: You have five more feet to go there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to Invoke Duplicity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In front of me, but I'm having her run into the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to make it look like she's casting Spiritual Weapon right in front of her. A giant lollipop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (reading) "As a bonus action, move it up to 30 feet."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I think I need to do an action to activate it, so forget it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your duplicate begins to look like it's casting a spell, but there are no additional flaring effects of the spell appearing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can do that, so I'm casting Spiritual Weapon through the duplicate is all that I meant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are casting Spiritual Weapon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it'll appear.

lines.name: LAURA, MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I saw flea market Laura Bailey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're choosing to have it appear in the chamber.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's looking like she bamfed in and she's ready to fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and then your bonus action is casting Spiritual Weapon where?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's casting Spiritual Weapon right over the bed, like she's protecting the bugbear.

lines.text: You have no one to attack with it, but it has been cast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, can I swing it wildly just to see if it hits anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, roll an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think there's ghosts in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it, roll an attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't seem to impact anything, but you got to give it a shot, why not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Might as well try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, what you got?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Peek into the room, peek around the corner with my goggles on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, and so--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of stealthily, just want to check the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say perception check, since you're looking specifically for something, go ahead and this'll be your bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's good. 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, sorry, 22.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance in-- or no, I'm sorry. You see the sleeping bugbear, you see Jester's spiritual weapon just swinging wildly over it just some weird Willy Wonka nightmare, and you see the duplicate of Jester in the chamber looking around and making hand motions like it's controlling the spiritual weapon, but that's all you see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said that was my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was your bonus action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In case it comes running out the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your go, Beau. Caduceus, you're up.

lines.text: Why are you so low on the initiative, Caleb?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know I can't see Nott, but I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a bonus action still if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You going to end your turn? All right, Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Full runaround with both action and movement, as far as I can get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30, you're coming around the corner right next to Beau's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also for my bonus, I will tell my swarm to head out the window and find those people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're 20, I believe, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, 20? They're in the window right there! Yeah, as they move you hear, (panicked noises) as the now somewhat lucid bugbear denizen of this chamber is wondering what the fuck is happening and is now just watching a cloud of beetles just scatter across his visual range and completely engulf the ceiling and window area of his bedroom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My duplicate is just smiling at him really creepily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like (panicked noises)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't let the bed bugbears bite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Every, just one after the other, Sam.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got to leave and come back in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need a short rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finish Caduceus's go, Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stick my head out and see what's going on and say: What is the plan? What are we doing? And that's the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or are you looking out this windows?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I enter this room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You open your mouth to talk and one of them, you're like why does, (spitting)! You spit one out and it finds its way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that's the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The male fiendish creature finishes the descent down into the well and vanishes from view.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we get an attack of opportunity? Doesn't matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From there that brings us to Yasha's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus, she can't push past the beetles and Caleb and get out the window, can she?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She can if she wants to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shove the wizard through.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah fuck it, she's going American Gladiators through the window.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She still has, she actually has tem more feet of movement, she's a barbarian.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, she'll dash and catch up to the rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to wait for our group to catch up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 seconds later everyone managed to gather.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll circle around staring down the hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all gather around the outside, the beetles overhead, you hear this voice behind go, "What is going on?" You look through the window and you see this half-dazed, very confused, scared-looking bugbear, a familiar one to you, peeking through going (confused noises).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get your head back in that window!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, sorry!" And slowly backs into the bed chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll bring my duplicate over while we're...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, where are we going? Down in there into the rift in the portal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or are we just going to seal it up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She said she wanted proof, how are we going to show proof that we sealed a portal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take a picture?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got a cell phone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can't just sit here. This is what we came for.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you a coward suddenly?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll climb down into the well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just trying to be patient, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're climbing down together?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want to jump? I can make us jump.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jump with me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Feather Fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your head and one arm and part of a knee in there and the other half of your body's like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I pull you through?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll wiggle it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are wedged, you are Winnie the Pooh trying to exit Rabbit's house right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need some help?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We can go home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to climb down the well and try to push him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have pull.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check with advantage because Nott is helping you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to wait for Yasha to see if she can open up the hole a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to wait and just look down and I'm going to see what happens.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've taken a few moments here right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A wave of exhaustion hits you just for five seconds, and then passes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your Beacon of Hope lasts for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One minute, it's probably gone now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that fades.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, all my stuff is gone, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The beetles probably have returned to their--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I start kicking at the hole to try and open it up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go down before Yasha, or you're already right there pushing Fjord in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I was bracing my back and pushing through with my legs on him, so I'm just going to keep kicking with my feet to try to open the floor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an additional strength check for me, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was aggressive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a bucket on this one, or is it just an open hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one has a bucket, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And a rope?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's a chain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From that impact you get caught up and you kick off and then come back and you find yourself in the well again, but it's in a big enough space where it's not an issue, and you're a little small than-- although actually no, your frames are fairly similar though you're shorter, but without issue you manage to push your way through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to look around, anybody watching us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's it look down there, too? What do we see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll get to that in just a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around you this time of night, it's hard to tell, you don't see anyone paying major attention other than Umadon, the bugbear that is currently peeking through the window and looks extremely frightened by what's going on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put your face back in the window!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go to bed! Back to bed!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pokes back into the interior.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Back to bed, booboo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can see you looking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking around, what do we see in front of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can make a perception check as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at it, because you have darkvision, it doesn't help too much, but a little bit of light seems to poke in from upstairs, you get a point of reference to see that there's moisture on the stones, there's a bit of glistening reflection to them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I convey some of that to the rest of the people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Heading down as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's the hardest for you to get in just from a sheer volume standpoint, but with your friends you do a one two three pull, and they hoist Caduceus into the interior.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figure they know we're coming, so Light's not a terrible idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little light fills the interior of the chamber and you all can see this probably long forgotten, condensed, but strangely beautiful cavernous chamber, and the tunnel ahead that curves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll turn invisible and run down the hall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Invisibility on yourself, perfect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealthily run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys watch Nott just vanish from sight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The shadow fades a while ago.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should probably head in that direction unless anybody's got anything they want to say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think that's where they get their resistances from.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're just resistant to everything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still trying to work this out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, yeah, I mean you just learned stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Nott just ran up that tunnel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go after her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's where we're going to pick up next week.

lines.name: SAM, LIAM
lines.text: Bastards.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it, nothing hits them when they're like that? What the fuck?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How can we kill them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got to try some ghost stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or the power of music.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: ♪ It's the power of love ♪

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could Rick Roll them. Just saying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: ♪ Never going to give you up ♪ ♪ Never going to let you down ♪

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What an amazing week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This week is crazy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is crazy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you don't know what that is, you should Google it and laugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And laugh that we still do this in places.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Con weekend.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's always fine, isn't it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're already exhausted, what's the difference?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of like the creatures that you just encountered, look at that timing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nice metaphor, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering) (epic rock music)
